oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Imaging under pop-up flaps of De humanis corporis fabrica libri septem by Andreas Vesalius using laparoscopy on 8 Feb 2018. Movie shows a view through the laparoscope, showing the complexity of the pop-up features.
